thread.title: Gabriela Baron joins KLDiscovery as Executive Vice President of Strategy

author: cnbc.com
title: Gabriela Baron joins KLDiscovery as Executive Vice President of Strategy
text:
McLean, VA, Feb. 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- KLDiscovery (KLD) announced today that Gabriela P. Baron has joined the company as the Executive Vice President of Strategy. In that role, Gaby will identify strategic growth opportunities as well as opportunities to meet evolving market needs that will enable the company to execute on its growth plan. She will be particularly focused on developing new relationships with global corporations and law firms.
“I am thrilled to welcome Gaby to our company," said Chris Weiler, CEO of KLDiscovery. "Gaby’s experience, leadership and consultative approach to ediscovery will immediately benefit our customers, products, services and employees. Gaby will undoubtedly be instrumental in helping the company successfully execute our plan for growth.”
Gaby began her legal career as a litigator at a major New York law firm where she worked on a wide variety of complex commercial cases for nearly nine years. Beginning in 2004, she joined litigation technology provider Amici, LLC and has since become a leading figure in the ediscovery industry, including in prominent roles at Xerox Litigation Services and Conduent for 11 years.
“I am truly excited to join KLD, which offers clients both top-notch Relativity qualifications and cutting-edge proprietary technology services in Nebula – a powerful combination,” said Gaby Baron, EVP of Strategy. “Nebula, with its cloud and on premise service capabilities, embodies what an ediscovery platform should be in 2018 and, given the development team dedicated to it, will continue to offer market-leading innovations in the future. I am excited to be part of an organization that combines the flexibility and creativity of a startup with the robust technologies, global reach and best-in-class resources to respond instantly to the needs of clients across the globe.”
About KLDiscovery
KLDiscovery provides technology-enabled services and software to help law firms, corporations, government agencies and consumers solve complex data challenges. The company, with offices in 43 locations across 20 countries, is a global leader in delivering best-in-class ediscovery, information governance and data recovery solutions to support the litigation, regulatory compliance, internal investigation and data recovery and management needs of our clients. Serving clients for over 30 years, KLDiscovery offers data collection and forensic investigation, early case assessment, electronic discovery and data processing, application software and data hosting for web-based document reviews, and managed document review services. In addition, through its global Ontrack Data Recovery business, KLDiscovery delivers world-class data recovery, email extraction and restoration, data destruction and tape management. KLDiscovery has been recognized as one of the fastest growing companies in North America by both Inc. Magazine (Inc. 5000) and Deloitte (Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500) and CEO Chris Weiler was recognized as a 2014 Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year™. Additionally, KLDiscovery is an Orange-level Relativity Best in Service Partner, a Relativity Premium Hosting Partner and maintains ISO/IEC 27001 Certified data centers. For more information, please email info@krolldiscovery.com or visit www.kldiscovery.com .
Media Contact: Krystina Jones, 703-424-0852, krystina.jones@kldiscovery.com
Source: KLDiscovery
